subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic rallied from a set down to beat a fellow Serb, Viktor Troicki, 4-6, 6-3, 6-1, and reach the quarterfinals of the Paris Masters.
snippet: Novak Djokovic rallied from a set down to beat a fellow Serb, Viktor Troicki, 4-6, 6-3, 6-1, and reach the quarterfinals of the Paris Masters.
